api_list.name: Fix Pay Simulation
api_list.description: Fix Pay Simulation. Parameters are /principal/rate/months where principal is the amount of loan, rate is the interest and months the number of monthly payments. The output will be a json containing the monthly ammount to be paid and an array with the beginning balance, interest, capital (principal) and ending balance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://loansimulator1.p.rapidapi.com/simulation/fix_pay/1000/1.5/12"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "loansimulator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
